title: Crypt of the Necrodancer is fantastic
body:
If you like rouge-likes and video game music, pick it up while it's on sale.

I can't believe how long it's been under my radar. It's my new Isaac.

To those who don't know, you play it like Pokemon Mystery Dungeon: where it's a top down view and enemies move when you do. The catch in this game, is that they move to the beat of the music, and that's the only time you can as well. Very satisfying mix of rhythm and strategy.
